cause.description:
frosted mini-wheats are the best cereal,yes even better than captain crunch. they would be even better if they had frost on both sides i mean who honestly loves the flavor of wheat
1. Fosted mini-wheats are the best cereal ever
2. the frosted side is better than the....wheated side?
3. Chuck Norris is amazing
cause.mission: get frost on both sides of the mini-wheat
cause.name: Frosted mini-wheats forever
